Package com.refinedmods.refinedstorage2.api.storage.composite

Class CompositeStorageImpl<T>

java.lang.Object
com.refinedmods.refinedstorage2.api.storage.composite.CompositeStorageImpl<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of resource
All Implemented Interfaces:
CompositeAwareChild<T>, CompositeStorage<T>, ParentComposite<T>, ExtractableStorage<T>, InsertableStorage<T>, Storage<T>, StorageView<T>, TrackedStorage<T>
@API(status=STABLE, since="2.0.0-milestone.1.0") public class CompositeStorageImpl<T> extends Object implements CompositeStorage<T>, CompositeAwareChild<T>, ParentComposite<T>
An implementation of CompositeStorage that can be contained into other CompositeStorages.
